about.paragraph: Over 3 years of experience as a Software Developer. Led embedded development of payment terminals at World POS Solutions, achieving a 60% improvement in app updates, Visa and MasterCard EMV certification, and strong knowledge in the financial sector.

contact.title: Get in touch with me
contact.intro: Do you have a project, an idea, or just want to say hello? Fill out the form and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

cv.name: Johs Salinas
cv.summary: QA Engineer with experience in the financial and web sectors, specialized in validation of critical systems and ensuring quality of complex platforms. Skilled in test automation, CI/CD and REST API testing.

bullets: Validation of financial transactions under JSON standards, including thorough testing of REST APIs using Postman to verify status codes, response formats and edge cases.
Implementation of tests for critical functionalities like QR payment systems.
Design and execution of testing plans for remote update systems, validating data integrity and reducing update errors.
Collaboration with international teams in defect identification, documentation and verification.
Leading EMV certification processes for Visa and MasterCard in Bolivia.
experiences.specialties: regression | functional | usability | performance | stress | security
experiences.skills: JavaScript | TypeScript | HTML | CSS | Postman | Cypress | REST | JSON | Linux | PostgresSQL

bullets: Design and implementation of automated testing strategies: unit, integration and E2E.
Optimization of CI/CD pipelines integrating multiple automated test types.
Improving testing processes by optimizing environments and migrating to WSL.
experiences.skills: Python | HTML | CSS | Jest | REST | JSON | JWT | MySQL | MongoDB

bullets: Designed and implemented a test automation suite for the purchase process, reducing manual validation time by 70% and ensuring platform reliability.
Validated the functionality of over 10 payment methods (including Stripe, Square, and PayPal), discount code logic, and cart behavior, increasing test coverage by 60%.
Successfully executed over 500 test cases, identifying and fixing 12 critical bugs before deployment, which reduced user-reported incidents by 90% after release.
experiences.specialties: automation | functional testing | payment integration | e-commerce | regression | APIs
experiences.skills: JavaScript | Cypress | Playwright | REST | JSON | Stripe | Square | PayPal | Git | Linux

bullets: Implemented a comprehensive maintenance management system using Odoo ERP, reducing incident response times on the farm by 50%.
Configured key features for livestock control, crop tracking, and payroll management, increasing administrative efficiency by 35%.
Integrated modules for transport management and area demarcation, improving control and supervision of agricultural activities and reducing logistics costs by 25%.
experiences.specialties: ERP | maintenance | agricultural management | transport | payroll | process optimization
experiences.skills: Odoo | Python | PostgreSQL | Git | Linux | project management

bullets: Developed custom software to optimize the operational management of a food distributor, reducing order processing time by 40%.
Created modules for energy consumption tracking, inventory control, supplier management, and distribution route planning, decreasing inventory errors by 30%.
Enabled better decision-making by integrating expense control and staff management tools, resulting in a 20% monthly operational cost saving.
experiences.specialties: custom development | operational management | inventory | routes | suppliers | expense control
experiences.skills: Python | JavaScript | Odoo | MySQL | HTML | CSS | Git | Linux

education.school: Institución Educativa Nuestra Señora De La Presentación
